page.title: 13OURSELVES
page.content: We get up about {7:30a.m }and have cereals for breakfast. We leave home at{8:45}and chatter in the playground before school begins at{8:55. Most mornings we do written work and maths until playtime when we go outside for{15}minutes. Lunch is from{12:00}until{1:30}. Most of us bring sandwiches ,but some have a school meal.A few go home.We have school clubs in the lunch time. From{1:30}until{3:40}we do things like {art,topic,swimming,games,storywriting {and quiet reading.}Most of us go out to play when we get home, and have our evening_meal about{5:30pm. Our evenings are usually spent watching television and we go to bed about 9o'clock.When we go on holiday,we usually stay in{Britain.} We have about Â£2 a week pocket money. { }
